INSERT INTO bill_sale_balance( id, fas_bill_code, bill_no, bill_type, biz_type, ref_bill_no, ref_bill_type, status, buyer_no, buyer_name, saler_no, saler_name, send_date, receive_date, send_store_no, send_store_name, receive_store_no, receive_store_name, supplier_no, supplier_name, item_no, item_name, item_code, brand_no, brand_name, brand_unit_no, brand_unit_name, category_no, category_name, cost, bill_cost, actual_cost, tax_rate, exclusive_cost, headquarter_cost, region_cost, region_cost_second, unit_cost, unit_cost_second, purchase_price, material_price, factory_price, send_qty, receive_qty, order_no, balance_no, is_split, balance_type, original_bill_no, path_no, order_unit_no, order_unit_name, organ_no, organ_name, order_unit_no_from, order_unit_name_from, organ_no_from, organ_name_from, zone_no, zone_name, zone_no_from, zone_name_from, years, season, orderfrom, gender, tag_price, tag_price_nation, bill_rebate_amount, bill_rebate_discount, create_user, create_time, claim_no, return_no, remark ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.fasBillCode}, #{item.billNo}, #{item.billType}, #{item.bizType}, #{item.refBillNo}, #{item.refBillType}, #{item.status}, #{item.buyerNo}, #{item.buyerName}, #{item.salerNo}, #{item.salerName}, #{item.sendDate}, #{item.receiveDate}, #{item.sendStoreNo}, #{item.sendStoreName}, #{item.receiveStoreNo}, #{item.receiveStoreName}, #{item.supplierNo}, #{item.supplierName}, #{item.itemNo}, #{item.itemName}, #{item.itemCode}, #{item.brandNo}, #{item.brandName}, #{item.brandUnitNo}, #{item.brandUnitName}, #{item.categoryNo}, #{item.categoryName}, #{item.cost}, #{item.billCost}, #{item.actualCost}, #{item.taxRate}, #{item.exclusiveCost}, #{item.headquarterCost}, #{item.regionCost}, #{item.regionCostSecond}, #{item.unitCost}, #{item.unitCostSecond}, #{item.purchasePrice}, #{item.materialPrice}, #{item.factoryPrice}, #{item.sendQty}, #{item.receiveQty}, #{item.orderNo}, #{item.balanceNo}, #{item.isSplit}, #{item.balanceType}, #{item.originalBillNo}, #{item.pathNo}, #{item.orderUnitNo}, #{item.orderUnitName}, #{item.organNo}, #{item.organName}, #{item.orderUnitNoFrom}, #{item.orderUnitNameFrom}, #{item.organNoFrom}, #{item.organNameFrom}, #{item.zoneNo}, #{item.zoneName}, #{item.zoneNoFrom}, #{item.zoneNameFrom}, #{item.years}, #{item.season}, #{item.orderfrom}, #{item.gender}, #{item.tagPrice}, #{item.tagPriceNation}, #{item.billRebateAmount}, #{item.billRebateDiscount}, #{item.createUser}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.claimNo}, #{item.returnNo}, #{item.remark} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bill_sale_balance WHERE original_bill_no = #{billNo} AND (balance_no IS NULL OR balance_no = '')
DELETE FROM bill_sale_balance WHERE original_bill_no = #{billNo} AND item_no = #{itemNo} AND (balance_no IS NULL OR balance_no = '')
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM bill_sale_balance WHERE original_bill_no = #{billNo} AND (balance_no IS NOT NULL AND balance_no != '')

SELECT saler_no, buyer_no, bill_no, bill_type, biz_type, send_date, IFNULL(sum(bill_rebate_amount),0) bill_rebate_amount, IFNULL(SUM(cost * send_qty),0) send_amount, (SELECT MIN(order_unit_no) FROM order_unit WHERE company_no=saler_no) order_unit_no FROM bill_sale_balance WHERE bill_no = #{billNo} AND bill_type = '1335' AND biz_type IN ('21', '22', '29', '30', '43')
SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM system_param_set WHERE 1=1 AND business_organ_no = #{companyNo} AND param_code= #{paramCode} AND dtl_value = #{dtlValue} AND status = 1
